title: Clark, Collier draft All-Star teams, flip coaches
description: Caitlin Clark selected her two Indiana All-Star teammates in the draft to determine teams for the WNBA All-Star Game on July 19.
author: Michael Voepel

title: Sources: Jokic to delay extension talks until '26
description: Nikola Jokic will not seek a contract extension this summer, delaying extension talks until next summer, a source confirmed to ESPN.
author: Ohm Youngmisuk

title: 19 forwards & Â£600m later... is Joao Pedro the frontman Chelsea need?
description: Chelsea's search for a centre-forward has been far, wide and expensive - but has Joao Pedro already shown he could be the answer?

title: Alcaraz masterclass ends Norrie's Wimbledon hopes
description: Two-time defending champion Carlos Alcaraz ends British hope Cameron Norrie's Wimbledon run to set up a semi-final against fifth seed Taylor Fritz.

title: Norrie suffers straight-sets drubbing to Alcaraz in quarter-final
description: Cameron Norrie went down in straight sets 6-2 6-3 6-3 in his quarter-final against defending champion Carlos Alcaraz to end British interest in the 2025 Wimbledon singles.

title: Dimitrov forced to retire when two sets up on world No 1 Sinner
description: Grigor Dimitrov was left in tears as he was forced to retire injured while leading Jannik Sinner by two sets to miss out on the Wimbledon quarter-finals.

title: Aces star A'ja Wilson leaves game vs. Liberty early after awkward fall on arm, wrist
description: A'ja Wilson hit the floor hard while trying to go up for a layup on Tuesday night in Brooklyn.
author: Ryan Young

title: Does Memphis basketball coach Penny Hardaway want Tennessee back on the schedule?
description: Memphis basketball coach Penny Hardaway reiterated his feelings about renewing the Tigers' rivalry with Tennessee.
